title: Switching Servers
body:
I need to switch servers to NA to play with a friend, but it keeps saying my account is being transferred, even though it's been about half an hour now

http://prntscr.com/fb6jeo

I've now waited around an hour, and have also done a full repair. I can't switch to NA, but I can still log into OCE

replies.body: Sorry for the late reply, everything good now? Sometimes they just take a little time.
